commandText:
SELECT t0.id, t0.account_head_id, t0.code, t0.created_at, t0.created_by, t0.is_deleted, t0.name, t1.id, t1.code, t1.created_at, t1.created_by, t1.is_deleted, t1.name, t1.percentage, t1.tax_master_id
FROM (
    SELECT t.id, t.account_head_id, t.code, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.is_deleted, t.name
    FROM fin_data.tax_masters AS t
    WHERE NOT (t.is_deleted) AND t.id = @__taxMasterId_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN fin_data.taxes AS t1 ON t0.id = t1.tax_master_id
ORDER BY t0.id

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.is_deleted, t.name, t.percentage, t.tax_master_id
FROM fin_data.taxes AS t
WHERE t.tax_master_id = @__taxMasterId_0

commandText:
SELECT t.id, t.branch_id, t.cancelled_at, t.cancelled_by, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.currency_code, t.entry_date, t.exchange_rate, t.is_cancelled, t.is_deleted, t.is_posted, t.journal_no, t.journal_type_id, t.notes, t.posted_at, t.posted_by, t.reference, j0.id, j0.account_head_id, j0.contact_person_id, j0.created_at, j0.created_by, j0.credit, j0.debit, j0.description, j0.is_deleted, j0.journal_id, j0.partner_id, j1.id, j1.created_at, j1.created_by, j1.is_deleted, j1.journal_id, j1.path
FROM (
    SELECT j.id, j.branch_id, j.cancelled_at, j.cancelled_by, j.created_at, j.created_by, j.currency_code, j.entry_date, j.exchange_rate, j.is_cancelled, j.is_deleted, j.is_posted, j.journal_no, j.journal_type_id, j.notes, j.posted_at, j.posted_by, j.reference
    FROM fin_data.journals AS j
    WHERE j.id = @__journalId_0 AND j.is_posted = @__IsPosted_1
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN fin_data.journal_accounts AS j0 ON t.id = j0.journal_id
LEFT JOIN fin_data.journal_docs AS j1 ON t.id = j1.journal_id
ORDER BY t.id, j0.id

SELECT t.id, t.branch_id, t.cancelled_at, t.cancelled_by, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.currency_code, t.entry_date, t.exchange_rate, t.is_cancelled, t.is_deleted, t.is_posted, t.journal_no, t.journal_type_id, t.notes, t.posted_at, t.posted_by, t.reference, j0.id, j0.account_head_id, j0.contact_person_id, j0.created_at, j0.created_by, j0.credit, j0.debit, j0.description, j0.is_deleted, j0.journal_id, j0.partner_id, j1.id, j1.created_at, j1.created_by, j1.is_deleted, j1.journal_id, j1.path
FROM (
    SELECT j.id, j.branch_id, j.cancelled_at, j.cancelled_by, j.created_at, j.created_by, j.currency_code, j.entry_date, j.exchange_rate, j.is_cancelled, j.is_deleted, j.is_posted, j.journal_no, j.journal_type_id, j.notes, j.posted_at, j.posted_by, j.reference
    FROM fin_data.journals AS j
    WHERE j.id = @__journalId_0 AND j.is_posted = @__IsPosted_1
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN fin_data.journal_accounts AS j0 ON t.id = j0.journal_id
LEFT JOIN fin_data.journal_docs AS j1 ON t.id = j1.journal_id
ORDER BY t.id, j0.id
